title: status:open
description: Show open Codenotes and Code Tours

title: status:resolved
description: Show resolved Codenotes and Code Tours

title: author:@
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours created by you (@me) or any teammate (@username)

title: participant:@
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours you (@me) or any teammate (@username) particiapte in

title: mention:@
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours where you (@me) or any teammate (@username) where mentioned in either title or description

title: title:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours that contain a specific keyword in their title

title: label:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours with specific label

title: file:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours that have files with matching keyword in files titles

title: commit:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours that include code with specified commit ID

title: branch:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours that include code with specified branch

title: repo:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours that include code from current repossitory (repo:current) specified repository (repo:name)

title: date:
description: Show Codenotes and Code Tours that were created today (date: today), yesterday (date:yesterday) on a specific date (date:YYYY-MM-DD, date:<YYYY-MM-DD, date:>YYYY-MM-DD)
